entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.3°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
